sentences.en: No, Mr. Collins, we have not an iota of proof in writing.
sentences.cn: 不, 柯林斯先生, 我们一点儿书面证据也拿不出来.

sentences.en: The surface, said Cheng Siwei, if not an iota of harm.
sentences.cn: 表面看来, 成思危如是说, 好像并无丝毫危害.

sentences.en: Yet it didn't matter one iota.

trans.tran_cn: 希腊文的第九个字母，极少量，一点儿
